metaDescription: Just enter how many kWh you need and find the best charging price on every stations.
title: Chargeprice - Check the best charging tariffs for your EVs
manageMyTariffsDescription: Select all tariffs that you own below.
errorPricesUnavailable: Prices unavailable. Please try to reload the page.
totalPriceInfo:
Total price of a charging session, given the provided parameters excl. monthly fees
* Calculated values incl. 10% charging drain. Actual values depend on vehicle, charging station, weather etc.
** Depending on tariff: Base fee, service fee, membership fee
Links to providers might be affiliate links, where Chargeprice gets a commission per click. Affiliate partner are not ranked higher. Tariffs are only sorted by prices.
showExclusiveProviderCustomerTariffsDeta: Some providers offer special tariffs for their house-hold energy customers
showForeignTariffsDetails: Some tariffs are not supposed to be used by people from foreign countries.
onlyShowMyTariffsDetail: Only stations where my tariffs are applicable.
priceDetailsDetails: Average price / kWh and type of billing (per Minute, kWh...)
dataSourceContentGoingElectric: Charging stations (Coordinates, plugs): Multiple regional sources and GoingElectric API
disclaimerContent: The provider of the website is not liable nor is there any guarantee for the correctness of the displayed data. The prices should only be used for benchmarking.
myVehicleSearchLabel: Enter the brand and model name of your vehicle.
unbalancedLoadDetail: Allow charging with more than 4.5 kW at AC stations for cars with uniphase AC charger
stationsWithAtLeast2ChargePoints: Stations with at least 2 charge points only
partnerSub: EV related stores & services we can recommend
startTimeSelectionHeader: When do you want to charge?
popupWelcomeText1:
Electric Vehicles are cool and charging is too!
We guide you through the different charging cards and apps and tell you which one works best for you!
popupWelcomeText2:
No need to think of kWh, minute and session based prices or how long the charge would take. 
We do the math and show you the estimated costs of your charging session.
popupSocialMediaHeader: Don't miss out a new price!
popupSocialMediaText1: On our Social Media Channels we always keep you up to date about the newest trends in charging your EV!
popupInstallText: Did you know that you can use Chargeprice just like a normal app, outside the browser?
popupDonateHeader: Together we are on a mission to make charging transparent!
popupDonateText:
Chargeprice is and should stay free for all EV driver! However hosting services for our server are not.
Help us to operating, maintaining and especially improving Chargeprice in the future! Thank you!
fbEmailHeader: Please provide your e-mail, so that we can reach out to you if we have follow-up questions
fbEmailFooter: You can also reach out to us directly via e-mail:
fbEmailFooterSubmitInvoice: If you have an invoice, feel free to send it via e-mail:
fbActualPricePlaceholder: Total Price or Price per kWh, minute etc.
fbThankYouText:
With your feedback you make this service more valueable for all others!
Follow us on Facebook and Twitter to be informed of all updates on Chargeprice.
fbMissingStationSelectOnMap:
Select the location of the missing station, by clicking on the correct location on the map. Please define the location as accurate as possible. 
To cancel click anywhere on the map and cancel on the dialog afterwards.
fastChargerMultiInfo: Fast chargers with 2 or more charging points
freeStationWithPricesInfo: This station is marked as free charging, but it's also connected to a charging network. If you need to activate the station with a charging card or app, the prices listed below might still apply!
minPowerInfo: Stations with min. power of {0} kW
zoomLevelDependentStation: We also hide stations based on the map zoom level.
infoDonateSub: Your donation helps to further develop Chargeprice
infoProSub: Extensive market insights, data exports and many more features
refreshSub: In case you see an outdated version of Chargeprice
routePlannerFeedbackText: This feature is in BETA mode! Give Feedback now!
stationSharingText: Check out this charging station on Chargeprice:
authLabelForgotPassword: Enter your email and we'll send you a link to get back into your account.
authSignUpSuccessfulText:
Thanks for signing up! We are happy to have you on board. 
We just sent you an email. You need to click the confirmation link in this email, before using the account.
authForgotPasswordSuccessfulText: We have just sent you an email with the instructions to reset your password.
authPasswordValidationError: Password must be at least 8 and max. 64 characters long.
authUsernameValidationError: Username can only contain letters, numbers and spaces
authEmailNotVerified:
Your email address is not yet confirmed. We sent you an email with a confirmation link when you registered. Please also check your spam folder. 
If you cant find the email, click on "Forgot password?". By resetting your password, your email will be confirmed as well.
authPasswordWrong: Sorry, this email and password combination is not existing. Please check your email and password and try again.
authServiceNotAvailable: Sorry, currently service is not available. Please try again later!
accountBenefits:
Benefits of the Chargeprice Account

The account unlocks the following features on Chargeprice:
  • Select your tariffs & subscriptions and have them displayed at the top of the price list.
  • Save your selected tariffs and vehicle to your account and access it on multiple devices.
  • Pre-filled email for the user feedbacks.
authLabelPrivatePolicy: I agree to the Terms & Conditions and Privacy Policy
manageMyTariffsBannerMessage: You didn't not subscribe to any tariffs yet and don't know which one are the best for you? Check out "My Best Charging Card" to find the tariffs that are best for you!
cookieConstentText:
We use Google Analytics to evaluate user behavior.
This allows us to continuously improve the functions of the website.
We do not use this data for personalized advertising or the like.
Consent is voluntary and does not affect the general functionality of the website.
confirmDeleteAccount: Do you really want to delete your account?
emailBodyPasswordChanged: The password of your Chargeprice account was changed successfully.
thgHeader: THG-Prämie für dein E-Auto in Österreich und Deutschland
thgInfo:
Als E-Autofahrer in Österreich bekommst du jährlich durch die Treibhausgasminderungsquote eine Prämie.

Du musst nichts weiter tun, als dich über den unten angeführten Link bei unserem Partner zu registrieren und bekommst danach die Prämie überwiesen. Dabei erhält auch Chargeprice auch kleine Provision: Eine Win-Win-Situation!

Die Prämie wird dabei von unserem Partner definiert und ist abhängig von der Auszahlungsart:

  • Österreich: 450€ (sofort & garantiert) oder bis zu 900€ (später & je nach Marktwert der THG-Quote)

Dies ist 100% seriös und es fallen für dich keine Kosten an!
priceLimitReachedHeader: Maximum number of free price checks reached!
priceLimitReachedText:
You can check up to {0} charging stations per day for free. 
Choose an offer to continue using Chargeprice:
priceLimitEvDriverText: Download our mobile app. It's free for personal use:
priceLimitProText: Chargeprice.pro is the service for professionals with exclusive features:
priceLimitProFeatureList:
• Unlimited number of price checks
  • Filter stations on the map by CPO
  • Export prices
  • A feature you need is missing? Tell us about it!
